posts.post_content: need low priced example . please pm. thank you.
Brings back memories.  This was the very first prewar card that I've ever owned. Bought when I was a kid at the national in Atlantic City just over 30 years ago!!

If the Miller Family, at one time, ground grain...
If the Cooper Family, at one time, made barrels....
If the Fletcher Family, at one time, made arrows....
If the Baker Family, at one time, made pastries....
If the Bookman Family, at one time, bound books...
If the Butcher Family, at one time, cut meat...

Just what in the hell was the Titcomb Family into, at one time?

Were hairy nipples a problem best resolved with a grooming implement?
